statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 9 \\ 5 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -23 \\ -25 \\ -26 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
